Title: Title
title 1 privacy: Policy and terms of use of the website and booking the experience
title 2 privacy: Terms and conditions for the experience provider
title 3 privacy: Payment and return policy for the GoAsbar website
section 1 privacy 01: • In the event of any damage or distortion of any of the properties of the experience provider, GoAsbar website is not responsible for any compensation, and the problem is between the experience provider and the customer.
section 1 privacy 02: • GoAsbar is not responsible for the availability or accuracy of the experience provider's service, but if there is a disagreement with the description of the service, the customer has the right to complain, and the GoAsbar administration has the right to cancel the membership of the provider
section 1 privacy 03: • In the event that the experience provider or the customer is absent more than once, the GoAsbar administration has the right to suspend membership and prevent joining in the future.
section 1 privacy 04: • GoAsbar has the right to delay or cancel the payment process in the event of illegal activities, fraud, suspicion, or for any security reasons.
section 1 privacy 05: • The age is 15 or more, and the presence of a minor in the experience is with the consent of the parents and the person providing the experience with the user.
section 1 privacy 06: • Acknowledgment and acceptance of all conditions and risks associated with the experience, if any.
section 1 privacy 07: • In the event that a problem is found between the customer and the experience provider, it is preferable to refer to the GoAsbar administration to solve it.
section 1 privacy 08: • The user undertakes to take full responsibility for participating in any experience in the event that he suffers from illness, mental problems, disability, or any reason that may endanger his life.
section 1 privacy 09: • Undertaking that all information provided is correct.
section 2 privacy 01: • The provider must be at least 18 years old.
section 2 privacy 02: • The experience provider bears all responsibility for the experience provided in terms of safety and security.
section 2 privacy 03: • The experience provider undertakes that he has all the legally required permits (if the experience requires that).
section 2 privacy 04: • The provider undertakes to develop a comprehensive description of the experience that includes:
section 2 privacy 07: 3. Conditions and requirements for the experience (minimum age, physical fitness, clothing, required tools...etc.) according to its type.
section 2 privacy 08: • The experience provider warrants that all information provided is correct.
section 2 privacy 09: • The provider undertakes that the price of the experience on the GoAsbar website is exactly equal to the price of the experience provided in any other platform, including direct booking from the owner of the experience. In the event that a violation of this is proven, the GoAsbar administration has the right to suspend membership and prevent joining in the future, and the provider’s dues (if any) will be forfeited.
section 2 privacy 10: • The site has the right to delete the experience, or to prevent the experience provider if it:
section 2 privacy 11: 1. The experience contains nudity, violence, harassment, drugs and other illegal substances.
section 2 privacy 12: 2. The experience does not respect or offend a religion, sect, person, government or organization, whether Islamic or otherwise.
section 2 privacy 13: 3. Manipulating prices and not putting the agreed price
section 2 privacy 14: • The experience may be tested by the standards and quality team in order to ensure the validity of the experience and performance.
section 2 privacy 15: • The provider must present the experience himself personally, and he is not entitled to authorize anyone else to carry it out, unless the authorization is recognized by the responsible authorities.
section 2 privacy 16: • The experience provider undertakes to treat all people in the GoAsbar community with respect, regardless of their religion, nationality, race, or age.
section 2 privacy 17: • In the event of changing the experience date, it is:
section 2 privacy 18: • The provider is allowed to change the experience date if there are no confirmed bookings.
section 3 privacy 01: • Payment can be made via Mada, Visa, MasterCard or Apple Pay cards.
section 3 privacy 02: • The GoAsbar administration undertakes to maintain the privacy of the payment data used
section 3 privacy 03: • The experience provider's dues are transferred within a maximum period of 72 hours from the end of the experience
section 3 privacy 05: 1. In the event that the cancellation was from the experience provider, the customer has the right to claim a full refund.
section 3 privacy 06: 2. In the event that the cancellation was by the customer before the agreed time (24 hours from the time of the trial) and which is mentioned in the description of the experience: the customer is entitled to a full refund, and in the event that the cancellation was after the agreed time, the customer loses the right to claim the money.
section 3 privacy 07: • The customer has the right to claim a refund in the event that the experience does not match its description, after providing sufficient evidence and approval of the GoAsbar administration.
section 3 privacy 08: • When you add a card to Apple Pay, card-related information, location, and information about device settings and use patterns may be sent to Apple to determine eligibility. Some of the above information, account-related information, and paired-device details may be shared with your card issuer or bank to determine eligibility and for anti-fraud purposes. When you use Apple Pay in apps and on the web, information necessary to process the payment is shared with the app or website. Your actual card number isn’t shared with the merchant. Apple Pay data that can no longer be tied to you may be used by Apple to improve Apple Pay and other Apple products and services.
